alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden and Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles south of Quincy to 12 miles south of Midway to near Crawfordville. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Midway, Woodville, Tallahassee, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Medart, Tallahassee Mall and Bloxham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon
